intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to download and install CA certificates into gEclipse.

item.title: Open the CA Certificates Dialog Box
item.description: Go to Window > Preferences, expand the g-Eclipse sub-tree and double-click the CA Certificates. You can click the Click to Perform button to have the Preferences dialog box open automatically.

item.title: Add CA Certificates
item.description:
To add certificates from a repository, click on Add from Repository and enter the URL of the repository in the box that opens up. Then click OK.
The various certificates will be downloaded, unzipped and installed.
To add the certifcates from a local directory, click on Add from Directory and choose the directory containing the certificates. Then click OK.
The various certificates found will then be copied to a dedicated directory in your workspace.
